meanings.definition: A soft, white Italian cheese made from whey
meanings.sent1: I spread ricotta on my toast for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The lasagna was delicious with a layer of ricotta cheese.
meanings.sent3: The mouse thought the ricotta was a cloud and tried to jump on it.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as soft as a spoonful of ricotta melting in the mouth.
meanings.sent5: The ricotta cheese oozed out of the cannoli, tempting everyone at the party.

meanings.definition: A dish made with ricotta cheese, such as lasagna or cannoli
meanings.sent1: Mom baked a scrumptious ricotta cheesecake for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The cannoli was filled with sweet ricotta and chocolate chips.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistakenly thought the ricotta dish was a new toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as comforting as a warm slice of ricotta pie.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked lasagna with ricotta filled the kitchen.
